thread.section_title: PC Game Supply Reviews | Customer Service Reviews of PC Game Supply | www.pcgamesupply.com
thread.title: Elias
thread.title_full: PC Game Supply reviewed by Elias

author: Elias
title: Elias
text: First I tried getting two 20$ eShop cards off of PA, it said the Codes'd be delivered in a span of 24 hours after that time they just changed the time to 1 week without giving me any notice. I opted for a refund, did a little research and wasn't disappointed with this site delivering the codes instantly.
